name: NBTCompoundHelper
description:
The `NBTCompoundHelper` class is a specialized helper for handling NBT compound tags in JSMacros. It provides a dictionary-like interface for accessing, navigating, and manipulating compound NBT data structures. Compound tags are the most common and flexible NBT type, used to store collections of named values with different types.

NBT compound tags are extensively used throughout Minecraft for storing complex data structures, including item enchantments, entity data, block entity information, player data, and world generation parameters. This helper class makes it easy to work with these structures in your scripts.

methods.name: wrapCompound
methods.description: Wraps a raw NbtCompound object in an NBTCompoundHelper.

methods.name: getKeys
methods.description: Returns a set of all keys in this compound tag.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the NBT type ID of the value stored at the specified key.

methods.name: has
methods.description: Checks if this compound contains a value at the specified key.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the value at the specified key as an NBTElementHelper.

methods.name: asString
methods.description: Retrieves the string representation of the value at the specified key.
